summary.name: bioconductor-copynumber
summary.description: Penalized least squares regression is applied to fit piecewise constantcurves to copy number data to locate genomic regions of constant copy number.Procedures are available for individual segmentation of each sample, jointsegmentation of several samples and joint segmentation of the two data tracksfrom SNP-arrays. Several plotting functions are available for visualizationof the data and the segmentation results.
